abstract: Oracle has finally won its prize, the rival BEA Systems, after sweetening the offer by 14 percent, just three months after BEA rejected its original bid.
snippet: Oracle has finally won its prize, the rival BEA Systems, after sweetening the offer by 14 percent, just three months after BEA rejected its original bid.
lead_paragraph: Oracle has finally won its prize, the rival BEA Systems, after sweetening the offer by 14 percent, just three months after BEA soundly rejected its original bid.

headline.main: An Improved Offer by Oracle Captures BEA Systems
headline.print_headline: An Improved Offer by Oracle Captures BEA Systems

abstract: Carl C. Icahn seemed pleased with himself Tuesday after BEA Systems agreed to a sweetened offer from Oracle.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn seemed pleased with himself Tuesday after BEA Systems agreed to a sweetened offer from Oracle.

headline.main: After BEA Deal, Icahn Pats Himself on the Back

abstract: With deals for open-source software companies heating up, The 451 Group asks whether Oracle, IBM, Novell and other acquirers will push the level of open-source mergers and acquisitions to another record in 2008.
lead_paragraph: With deals for open-source software companies heating up, The 451 Group asks whether Oracle, IBM, Novell and other acquirers will push the level of open-source mergers and acquisitions to another record in 2008.

headline.main: The Outlook for Open Source Deal-Making
